lisp_spec:
(task
 (name "findSecret")
 (signature ( (self) (text str) ) str)
 (constraints
   (constraint "The input text is a string containing multiple lines of background information.")
   (constraint "The secret word is always the last word in the text.")
 )
 (goal
   (description "Extract the secret word from the provided text.")
   (rule "The function should return only the last word of the text as the secret word.")
   (return "The secret word is returned as a string.")
 )
)
